Question
========

In a t-test on the difference between two averages, the *standard error* of the difference between the averages can be estimated in two ways estimated. One of the two ways assumes that the populations are

Answerlist
----------

* Have the same variance.
* Are the same size.
* Have the same mean.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Have the same variance Correct
* Be the same size: Incorrect
* Have the same mean: Incorrect
